location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter no.327 of 1860 from Captain Felix Jones, Political Resident in the Persian Gulf, to Henry Lacon Anderson, Chief Secretary to the Government of Bombay

mods.abstract: The letter relates to the appointment of the British Agents at Muscat and Lingah [Bandar-e Lengeh], and the payment of their respective salaries, for the attention of the civil auditor.
